name: Magical Lantern
description:
You were awakened in the middle of the night to a sight of a half-destroyed village.  To make things worse, the turmoil destroyed your magical lantern. You have to travel through a fantasy world, collect lost essences and solve puzzles to meet magical beings which will help you protect your home.

Magical Lantern is a short top-down puzzle atmospheric game. You play as a mage, who uses his magical lantern to store essences which you find on your way, and then you can switch between them to solve puzzles you encounter during your journey.

Features

  • 15-20 minutes of gameplay
  • Tricky, but satisfying puzzles involving doors, levers, buttons, pressure plates and torches, with a sprinkle of magic
  • Beautiful, hand-drawn atmospheric fantasy world with two distinct locations: Mysterious graveyard filled with ghosts and dragon's palace surrounded by lava
  • A story about the struggles of a mage in a fantasy world
  • Adaptive music

The game can be played with a controller (recommended) or on a keyboard.
